CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL( Schedule_Frequency__c , 'D') , 'Weekly',
IF(AND( ISPICKVAL( Schedule_Frequency__c , 'W'), ISPICKVAL(Frequency_Interval__c, '2')) , 'EOW',
IF( ISPICKVAL( Schedule_Frequency__c , 'W') ,'Weekly',
IF(AND( ISPICKVAL( Schedule_Frequency__c , 'M'), Final_Frequency__c = 1) , 'Monthly',
IF( ISPICKVAL( Schedule_Frequency__c , 'Y') , 'Y',
'None' )))))
CustomField.label: Pricing Frequency Type
